Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.home

Interface HomeBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardHomeBuilder
public interface HomeBuilder
Interface defines a contract for building homes. Implementing classes should provide methods for configuring and constructing homes with various floors, rooms, inhabitants, and room-building components.
